queries: If pimples are located elsewhere (eg, on the back) they are usually located after using this form of the sign.
verbLexeme: 1. To have a lot of pimples, especially on your face. English = (be) pimply, (be) spotty.
nominalLexeme: 1. Small red spots, especially on your face. English = pimples, spots.
oldEntry: Popular explanation: indicating pimples on cheek.
